item.description:
Come enjoy a fabulous buffet,  Laugh, and then dance with us........

.... a Saturday Night that's just Filled with Entertainment!

This time we have two blockbuster Las Vegas Headliners that will have you ROFLYAO!

The Comedian line up includes; Kenny Rogerson, & Artie Januario

KENNY ROGERSON

For the past 20 years Kenney Rogerson has been one of the top comedians in the region and among the best comics nation wide. Frequently referred to as “the funniest man you’ve never heard of,” Rogerson combines a brilliant wit and an understated sarcasm that has led him to the nation’s top clubs as well as appearances on the late night talk shows including Letterman, and Conan O’Brien as well as appearances on Comedy Central, Showtime’s “A Pair of Jokers,” Evening at the Improv, and MTV.

As well as making stops to perform in Las Vegas and Atlantic City Rogerson has appeared as “Kevin the Biker Fireman” on the FX hit show “Rescue Me” and as “Pat the Cop” on ABC’s “It’s All Relative.” Rogerson wrote and starred in comedy film pieces on Fox Television Network’s “Sunday Comics” and has made film appearances in “Fever Pitch” and “There’s Something About Mary.”

He is simply one of the funniest comedians in the business.

“Comics Come Home” for Comedy Central and Showtime’s  “A Pair of Jokes” just to name a few.

ARTIE JANUARIO

Artie Januario is one of Boston's premier comedians. A regular in Las Vegas he is also makes frequent appearances at the Comedy Connection of Boston, Nicks Comedy Stop, and Giggles in Saugus, MA. He's opened for Dom Irrera, Richard Lewis, Lenny Clarke, and many other national headliners. He also recently hosted the prestigious Comics Come Home event in Boston.

Relating stories of family, married life and the work place, Januario is able to relate to virtually everyone in his audience and has one of the funniest acts in the business.

 

The Crestivew on Montvale Ave. has free parking...

Tickets are $15 for the show, and $15 for the buffet ($30 for both, PLUS dancing until midnight!) Just come up the staircase, pay for the show & buffet (buffet's not required) and sign the meetup log book, then come into the ballroom and look for meetup signs on the tables or look for your hosts!!! My Contact # is (603) 759-9876

Last event we had about 150 meetup members, 94% enjoyed the buffet, and I know they were more than pleased. This buffet is prepared by Peter (the owner & executive chief of the Crestview) and his professional staff of chiefs. The food is fantastic! They will even take your special dietary needs into consideration and back to the kitchen to prepare your custom meal! Just ask.

Now, here's a summary of the night:

From 6:00 to 7:45 pm enjoy a mouth watering buffet while we socialize.

At 8:00 we’ll laugh with some of the most hilarious Las Vegas comics for 2 full hours!! That alone should be enough to keep you smiling and your adrenaline pumping!

But there's more; dancing til’ midnight to a spectacular DJ that will play your request shortly after you make them!

Wow, what a night, and all in one comfortable venue with your meetup friends!!! Oh, almost forgot again, drinks will be served throughout the entire evening! Now get out and tell your friends and let’s have another FANTASTIC Saturday night!

Looking forward to seeing you all!

~ Dana      (603) 759-9876
item.how_to_find_us: Just come up the staircase, pay and sign the meetup log book, come in the ballroom and look for meetup signs on the tables or look for your hosts!!! My Contact # is (603) 759-9876
item.name: COMEDY SHOW in WOBURN, buffet before, & dancing after
